Name: Cloro
description:
Cloro, 58 years old, lives in the village of Las Vegas de Cuyamel, Patuca, Olancho, to the east of Honduras. He lives with his wife and 2 children.

His primary business is cattle ranching, a line of work in which he has 21 years of experience, which has allowed him to grow economically. From this business, he get the income to cover his family expenses, having beef and dairy cattle. He is a very well-known person in the village for being very responsible and very dedicated to his work, he also works in agriculture.

With the loan that he has requested, he has as a project to clean his pastures and repair the fence on his land to improve his property and get better profits, since his dream is to continue growing in this field and continue improving his life style.

Trojes, Honduras
August 2017
